branchItem.name: Positive Pressure Sensors
branchItem.description: <p>SMC offers a range of pressure monitoring devices to meet the diverse application requirements of our customer base. Within the collection you will find IP ratings as high as IP67, IO-Link capability, and pneumatic or liquid compatibility. Multi-line, multi-color displays offer more information with better visibility.  Digital and analog outputs characterize operational conditions in useful ways.  Categories are clearly defined to assist product selection.</p>

branchItem.name: Vacuum/Compound Pressure Sensors
branchItem.description: <p>SMC offers a range of vacuum monitoring devices to meet the diverse application requirements of our customer base. Within the collection you will find IP ratings as high as IP67, IO-Link capability, and pneumatic or liquid compatibility. Multi-line, multi-color displays offer more information with better visibility.&nbsp; Digital and analog outputs characterize operational conditions in useful ways.&nbsp; Categories are clearly defined to assist product selection.</p>

branchItem.name: Flow Switches
branchItem.description: <p>A digital flow switch is mounted directly inline with your machine or workstation's water supply to provide you with instantaneous flow information. &nbsp;An impressive set of specifications offers you flexibility in how you observe the flow data, while enhancing your ability to react to changing conditions.</p>

branchItem.name: Auto Switches
branchItem.description: <p>SMC offers a variety of auto switches for actuators and air grippers. &nbsp;Reed and solid state switches are available in a general purpose type or with 2-color indication, which allows the optimum operating position to be determined by the color of the light. &nbsp;Solid state switches are also available in 2-color indication with diagnostic output, water resistant 2-color indication, built-in OFF-delay timer (200 ms), magnetic field resistant, heat resistant and wide range detection configurations. &nbsp;Various lead wire lengths are available.</p>

branchItem.name: Electronic Regulators
branchItem.description: <p>Electro pneumatic air regulators control air/vacuum pressure steplessly in proportion to an electric signal. They are light weight in design with a bright and easy to read LED display. The monitor output is available either as analog output or switch output.</p>
